label: 高天原爾神留坐須
ローマ字1: takama no hara [ni kamu zu mari masu]
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
見出し読み: たかまのはらにかむづまりますかみとどまり
説明文: [Kaempfer glossary says: takama no hara kami todomari]  a prayer from the Engishiki, the sentence meaning The gods are on the heavenly plain" [延喜式] "
